title: Tahm Kench = troll
body: So tahm kench's devour is just too trolly. You could run up to allies then spit them at a tower repeatedly (that happened to me quite a few times) So maybe allies could press a key to get out of tahm kench?.

replies.body: You can leave Tahm Kench's belly, it just has about a 1 second CD after he eats you. All you have to do is right click in the direction you wanna go.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y24xT10a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-23T08:25:33.098+0000)
>
> You can leave Tahm Kench's belly, it just has about a 1 second CD after he eats you. All you have to do is right click in the direction you wanna go.

That has never worked.

That never works for me either. 
And why can't you do it instantly?
you're supposed to be able to click and get yourself out of it. I've tried numerous times and it barely works.
